The data is [Global Fisheries Landings V4.0](https://metadata.imas.utas.edu.au/geonetwork/srv/api/records/5c4590d3-a45a-4d37-bf8b-ecd145cb356d). This is the data that feeds into Sea Around Us, 

```{r}
#| label: import
data_cache <- here("data", ".cache")
dir.create(data_cache, showWarnings = FALSE)

dataset_base <- "https://data.imas.utas.edu.au/attachments/5c4590d3-a45a-4d37-bf8b-ecd145cb356d/"

board_url(
  c(
    codes = paste(dataset_base, "Codes.xlsx")
  ), cache = data_cache) #%>%
  # pin_download("sau") ->
sau

saudata <- read_csv(sau)
```
